name: Active Directory Create Admin Account
description: Use Admin Credentials to Create A Domain Admin Account

data.command:
echo "dn: CN=Admin User,CN=Users,DC=#{domain},DC=#{top_level_domain}
changetype: add
objectClass: top
objectClass: person
objectClass: organizationalPerson
objectClass: user
cn: Admin User
sn: User
givenName: Atomic User
userPrincipalName: adminuser@#{domain}.#{top_level_domain}
sAMAccountName: adminuser
userAccountControl: 512
userPassword: {CLEARTEXT}s3CureP4ssword123!
memberOf: CN=Domain Admins,CN=Users,DC=#{domain},DC=#{top_level_domain}" > tempadmin.ldif
echo ldapadd -H ldap://#{domain}.#{top_level_domain}:389 -x -D #{admin_user} -w #{admin_password} -f tempadmin.ldif
ldapadd -H ldap://#{domain}.#{top_level_domain}:389 -x -D #{admin_user} -w #{admin_password} -f tempadmin.ldif

echo removing Atomic User (temporary user)
echo "dn: cn=Atomic User,cn=Users,dc=scwxscratch,dc=dev\nchangetype: delete" > deleteuser.ldif
ldapmodify -H ldap://#{domain_controller}:389 -x -D #{admin_user} -w #{admin_password} -f deleteuser.ldif
rm deleteuser.ldif
rm tempadmin.ldif

steps.name: Check dependency 1/1
steps.description: Packages sssd-ad sssd-tools realmd adcli installed and realm available

steps.name: Resolve dependency 1/1
steps.description: Packages sssd-ad sssd-tools realmd adcli installed and realm available

data.command: echo ldapadd or ldapmodify not found; exit 1

steps.name: Re-check dependency 1/1
steps.description: Packages sssd-ad sssd-tools realmd adcli installed and realm available

input_arguments.name: top_level_domain
input_arguments.description: The top level domain (.com, .test, .remote, etc... following domain, minus the .)

input_arguments.name: admin_user
input_arguments.description: username@domain of a user with admin privileges

input_arguments.name: admin_password
input_arguments.description: password of the user with admin privileges referenced in admin_user

input_arguments.name: domain_controller
input_arguments.description: Name of the domain_controller machine, defined in etc/hosts
